attributes.action: instruct the appropriate person or authority to award damages in accidents, etc., according ONLY to how the accident/whatever has affected the victim
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is in response to the case (which was in the news during the period when no new petitions were being accepted) of someone (forget details but was, I think, either a sports or pop star) being awarded MASSIVE  compensation for an accident which (again as far as I remember) wasn't THAT disabling.  The rationale for this was that since he had been (had been lucky enough to have the talent to be!) in a very high-earning profession the amount he would lose by being unable to practise it would be correspondingly high which does seem, on the face of it, to be fair but I feel it's simply perpetuating inequalities of income which are totally unrelated to the value to society of the actual work done by, e.g., sports stars compared to, e.g., nurses etc.
